content: materials our color study blanket bundle 1 includes all the yarn you ll need for your own crib throw blanket 10 16 skeins of purl soho s daily wool worsted 2 100% superwash wool yarn each skein of this worsted/aran-weight yarn is 164 yards/ 100 grams approximately 1490 2495 total yards required we used the field thistle and fishing hut bundles - color a 2 4 skeins approximately 290 635 total yards required - color b 3 5 skeins approximately 490 820 total yards required - color c 3 5 skeins approximately 490 820 total yards required - color d 2 2 skeins approximately 220 220 total yards required you will also need - us 7 4 5 mm 40-inch circular knitting needles 3 note an earlier version of this pattern used 9 skeins of purl soho s worsted twist 4 no longer available and had a different gauge square shape and one size for more on that version visit our original color study blanket pattern 5 gauge 19 stitches and 38 row 19 ridges = 4 inches in garter stitch note the throw size uses almost all of colors b and c to avoid running short be sure to check your gauge by swatching with color d and keep tails short sizes crib throw finished dimensions 39 inches wide x 30 inches tall 39 inches wide x 51 inches tall samples we knit the crib size in the field thistle and fishing hut bundles originally designed by purl soho designer laura ferguson 6 and updated by purl soho designer hiromi glover 7 see even more of hiromi s work on her instagram 8 1 https //www purlsoho com/color-study-blanket-bundle html 2 https //www purlsoho com/daily-wool-worsted html 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 4 https //www purlsoho com/worsted-twist 5 https //www purlsoho com/create/2016/01/29/color-study-blanket/ 6 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/laura-ferguson-for-purl-soho/ 7 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/hiromi-glover-for-purl-soho/ 8 https //www instagram com/mignonnegrise/
